description:
Reliable Distributed Provisioning Grid (RDPG) is an Open Source operations framework built to provide a platform for deploying and provisioning PostgreSQL service clusters. These service clusters provide shared and dedicated managed databases to applications. The RDPG system is written on top of the BOSH operations-lifecycle management platform (BOSH is used to deploy and manage the lifecycle of Cloud Foundry). 

http://www.pgconf.us/2016/event/144/on-providing-scalable-managed-postgresql-services-to-cloud-foundry/
title: On Providing Scalable Managed PostgreSQL services to Cloud Foundry  Xiujiao Gao mp4
